alert.note: Alert for Finney; Haskell; Lane (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 02 at 2:38PM CST until December 02 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM TO 8 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Blowing Dust Warning, visibility less than one quarter mile in blowing dust. For the High Wind Warning, north winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Lane, Finney and Haskell Counties. * WHEN...For the Blowing Dust Warning, until 7 PM CST this evening. For the High Wind Warning, from 6 PM to 8 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People with respiratory problems should make preparations to stay indoors until the storm passes. Be ready for a sudden drop in visibility to near zero. If you encounter blowing dust or blowing sand on the roadway or see it approaching, pull off the road as far as possible and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights all the way off and keep your foot off the brake pedal. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive.
